item.title: Genome-wide association studies -- identify positions of causal polymorphisms(loci)
item.description:
Summary Apply GWAS to discern position of as many causal polymorphisms, with covariate analysis using Principal Component Analysis and Bayesian Inference.

Keywords GWAS, Quantitative Genetics and Genomics, PCA, Bayesian Inference

item.title: California Camp Fire
item.description:
Summary

Retrieve TerraClimate precipitation data in California from 1950-2020 for analysis of climate change with respect to frequent camp fire. Use Statistical Test (Mann-Whitney Test / Spearmanâ€™s rho / Kolmogorov-Smirov test) to check mean change over time.

Keywords Environment, Natural Reservation, Data Analysis, Time Series
